introduction: With built-in and extensible Modes, Neira Coder lets you plan, design, code, debug, and boost productivity like never before.
notice: This extension needs an API provider to get started.
chooseProvider: For its magic, Roo needs an API key.
startRouter: We recommend using an LLM router:
startCustom: Or you can use your own API key:

telemetry.title: Help improve Neira Coder
telemetry.anonymousTelemetry: Send anonymous error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. Code, prompts, and personal information are never sent.
telemetry.changeSettings: You can always change this at the bottom of the <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> page
